item.title: React and Redux recipe search: Part 2. API Access with thunks
item.description: Now that your frontend is awesome, let’s get the “search” button to work. Take a look at this neat little API: http://www.recipepuppy.com/about/api/ As APIs go it’s pairly straight-forward. It’s also free and requires no authentication. Instructions Add a Button labelled “Search” to your web application. When the user clicks on this button do the following: Access the api using a thunk once the results arrive, display them in a nice table.
